;Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, December 2  On December 2, President Xi Jinping addressed the 2023 "Reading A congratulatory letter from the International Conference on "Understanding China" (Guangzhou).

;

;Xi Jinping said that at present, the world economic recovery is sluggish, geopolitical conflicts are intensifying, and mankind is once again standing at the crossroads of history. We need to work together to respond to various global challenges, promote common global development, and enhance global cooperation. Human welfare.

;

;Xi Jinping pointed out that the key to understanding China is to understand Chinese-style modernization. Today, China is comprehensively advancing the great cause of building a strong country and rejuvenating the nation with Chinese-style modernization, and promoting the construction of a community with a shared future for mankind. China's future and destiny are closely linked to the future and destiny of mankind. We insist on promoting high-quality development with high-level openness, continue to create a market-oriented, legalized, and international business environment, and steadily expand institutional openness such as rules, regulations, management, and standards. We are unswervingly committed to expanding the convergence of interests with other countries, and continue to bring new impetus and new opportunities to the world with China's new development. China looks forward to working with other countries to achieve world modernization featuring peaceful development, mutually beneficial cooperation, and common prosperity. It is hoped that the guests attending the meeting will contribute to promoting exchanges and cooperation between China and the world, achieving common development and prosperity, and promoting the construction of a community with a shared future for mankind.

;

;The "Understanding China" international conference was co-sponsored by the China National Innovation and Development Strategy Research Association, the Chinese People's Institute of Foreign Affairs, and the Guangdong Provincial People's Government. It opened in Guangzhou on the 2nd, with the theme "China under a century of changes" New actions - expanding the convergence of interests and building a community with a shared future."

;Our newspaper, Bangkok, December 2  (Reporter Liu Hui) "Xi Jinping: The Governance of China" No. A promotion meeting for the Thai version of the second volume was held recently at the National Institute of Development Management in Thailand. More than 120 representatives from all walks of life in China and Thailand attended the meeting.

;

;Thailand Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Commerce Putan Wijayachai said at the promotion meeting that President Xi Jinping’s governance thoughts have made great contributions to promoting the progress of human society and he believes in "Xi Jinping: The Governance of China" The release of the Thai version of the second volume will further promote mutual learning between Thailand and China in terms of governance experience.

;

;Liu Dawei, deputy director of China International Publishing Group, said at the promotion meeting that he expected the translation and publication of the Thai version of the second volume of "Xi Jinping: The Governance of China" to provide ideological enlightenment to Thai readers, and hoped that the two countries would continue to enrich "Chinese The contemporary connotation of "Thailand, one family" brings together wisdom and strength to write a new chapter of comprehensive strategic partnership and work together to build a community with a shared future for China and Thailand.

;

;Han Zhiqiang, Chinese Ambassador to Thailand, said in his speech that the Thai version of "Xi Jinping: The Governance of China" will become a window for Thai readers to understand China's path, a key to understanding China's wisdom, and a key to mutual trust and mutual benefit between China and Thailand. The link of common progress will provide a rich ideological and theoretical basis for promoting the construction of a China-Thailand community with a shared future.

;

;Phini Zalusompa, former deputy prime minister of Thailand and chairman of the Thailand-China Cultural Promotion Committee, said that the cooperation between Thailand and China on the translation and publication of the Thai version of the second volume of "Xi Jinping: The Governance of China" is "Thailand-China cooperation". The important practice of the spirit of "China and one family" in the new era will promote mutual learning of the two countries' governance experiences.

;

;Sunday, December 3, 2023
; ;

;December 4 this year is our country’s tenth National Constitution Day.

;

;On December 4, 1982, the fifth session of the Fifth National People's Congress adopted the current constitution. On November 1, 2014, the 11th meeting of the Standing Committee of the 12th National People's Congress passed the "Decision on the Establishment of National Constitution Day" and established December 4 as National Constitution Day. Nowadays, through the National Constitution Day activities and other activities as a carrier, the Constitution has increasingly entered daily life and reached the people. The more times develop and society progresses, the more people feel the power and warmth of the Constitution.

;

;To persist in governing the country according to the law, we must first persist in governing the country in accordance with the constitution; to persist in governing in accordance with the law, we must first persist in governing in accordance with the constitution.

;

;Since the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, the Party Central Committee with Comrade Xi Jinping as the core has attached great importance to comprehensively governing the country according to law. It has positioned the rule of law, laid out the rule of law, and strictly enforced the rule of law from a strategic perspective related to the long-term stability of the party and the country. The governance of the country should be planned and promoted within the "Four Comprehensives" strategic layout to promote the construction of my country's constitutional system and the implementation of the Constitution to achieve historic achievements, and to provide a solid legal guarantee for the construction of a strong country and national rejuvenation.

;

;;To safeguard the authority of the Constitution is to safeguard the authority of the common will of the Party and the people;

;

;The national emblem hangs high and shines brightly.

;

;On March 10, 2023, at the third plenary session of the 14th National People’s Congress, nearly 3,000 National People’s Congress deputies witnessed this sacred moment together——

;

;President Xi Jinping, Chairman of the Central Military Commission, pressed the Constitution with his left hand, raised his fist with his right hand, and solemnly swore an oath. The sonorous and powerful oath resounded throughout the Great Hall of the People.

;

;In 2018, for the first time in the history of the People's Republic of China, national leaders took an oath to the Constitution and went down in history. Nowadays, it has become normal for state workers to take an oath to the Constitution when taking office. This encourages and educates state workers to be loyal to, abide by, and uphold the Constitution, and the steps to comprehensively govern the country according to law are more solid.

;

;If you want a tree to grow long, you must strengthen its roots; if you want a tree to flow far, you must dredge its source.

;

;Socialism with Chinese characteristics has entered a new era, which has put forward new and higher requirements for our party to promote comprehensive governance according to law, especially governing the country according to the constitution and governing according to the constitution.

;

;On December 4, 2012, at a meeting in the capital to commemorate the 30th anniversary of the promulgation and implementation of the current Constitution, General Secretary Xi Jinping delivered an important speech and pointed out: "To safeguard the authority of the Constitution is to safeguard the authority of the common will of the Party and the people. To defend the dignity of the Constitution is to defend the dignity of the common will of the Party and the people. To ensure the implementation of the Constitution is to ensure the realization of the fundamental interests of the people."

;

;After 10 years, in December 2022, General Secretary Xi Jinping published a signed article "Writing a New Chapter in China's Constitutional Practice in the New Era - Commemorating the 40th Anniversary of the Promulgation and Implementation of the Current Constitution" comprehensively reviews the historic achievements in the construction of our country's constitutional system and implementation of the constitution, profoundly summarizes the regular understanding of the construction of our country's constitutional system, and proposes new changes in the new era. The journey is to fully implement the clear requirements of the Constitution.

;

;Establish the guiding position of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era in national politics and social life; write “the leadership of the Communist Party of China is the most essential feature of socialism with Chinese characteristics” into Article 1 of the General Program of the Constitution; "Perfect the socialist legal system" is changed to "improving the socialist rule of law". The change from "system" to "governance" is of great significance...

;

;On March 11, 2018, "The People's Republic of China The Amendment to the Constitution of the Republic of China was passed by a high vote, and waves of applause rang out in the Great Hall of the People for a long time. Comply with the requirements of the times and the will of the people, stand at a new historical position, promptly incorporate the new great achievements and valuable experiences created by the party and the people into the solemn Constitution, uphold and develop socialism with Chinese characteristics for the new era, and realize the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation The Chinese Dream provides a solid constitutional guarantee.

;

;The Constitution is the general charter for the governance of the country. The party leads the people to formulate and improve the constitution in order to give full play to the important role of the constitution in governing the country.

;

;Deepen the reform of the supervisory system on the track of the rule of law - In 2018, shortly after the constitutional amendment was passed, as the red silk cloth on the bronze plaque of the "National Supervisory Commission of the People's Republic of China" was unveiled, a brand new reflection The corruption work agency was established.

;

;The protection of civil rights opens a new era - open the "Civil Code of the People's Republic of China", and it clearly states at the beginning that "this law is formulated in accordance with the Constitution." As the first law named after the "Code" since the founding of the People's Republic of China, this "encyclopedia of social life" actively implements the provisions of the Constitution in terms of protecting citizens' rights and provides more comprehensive protection for citizens' rights.

;

;The legal guarantee for the practice of "one country, two systems" is more powerful - in the face of the turbulent changes in the situation in Hong Kong, we must effectively implement the comprehensive jurisdiction over the Special Administrative Region in accordance with the Constitution and the Basic Law, formulate and implement the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region's National Security Law, Implementing the principle of "patriots governing Hong Kong", the situation in Hong Kong has achieved a major turn from chaos to governance.

; "Important role" "Better give play to the guarantee role of the rule of law in consolidating the foundation, stabilizing expectations, and benefiting the long-term, and comprehensively build a modern socialist country on the track of the rule of law."

;

;The people are the foundation of the country, and the foundation is the foundation of the country.

;

;Hongqiao Street, Changning District, Shanghai, is one of the first grassroots legislative contact points established by the Legal Affairs Committee of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress. It is a "through train" for national legislation for ordinary people to express social conditions and public opinion at their doorsteps.

;

;Xia Yunlong, a local resident who is over eighty years old, recalled that when soliciting opinions on the national anthem law a few years ago, he put forward suggestions on singing the national anthem at the discussion meeting. The relevant suggestions were eventually adopted by legislation. Article 5 of the National Anthem Law stipulates: "The state encourages citizens and organizations to play and sing the national anthem on appropriate occasions to express patriotic sentiments."

;

;The party leads the people in formulating and implementing the constitution, and finally The fundamental purpose is to safeguard the interests of the people, reflect the will of the people, protect the rights and interests of the people, and enhance the well-being of the people.

;

;Since the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, we have adhered to the organic unity of the party’s leadership, the people being the masters of the country, and the rule of law, developed people’s democracy throughout the process, and integrated the people-centered development concept throughout legislation, law enforcement, and judiciary , abide by the law in all aspects, accelerate the improvement of the legal system that embodies fair rights, fair opportunities, and fair rules, protect citizens' personal rights, property rights, personality rights, and basic political rights from being infringed, and ensure that citizens' economic, cultural, social and other rights are implemented.

;

;;The life of the Constitution lies in its implementation, and the authority of the Constitution also lies in its implementation;

;

;“Legislation should comply with the provisions, principles and spirit of the Constitution, and in accordance with statutory authority and procedures, proceeding from the overall interests of the country, and safeguarding the unity, dignity, and authority of the socialist legal system." On March 13, 2023, the First Session of the 14th National People's Congress voted by a high vote to amend the "Legislative Law of the People's Republic of China".

;

;Legislative law is called "law governing law". The Constitution makes basic provisions on the legislative system, legislative powers, etc. The Legislative Law makes systematic provisions on the legislative system, powers, procedures and legislative supervision systems based on the Constitution, which is an important manifestation of the implementation of the relevant provisions of the Constitution through law. One of the highlights of this revision of the Legislative Law is to strengthen the implementation and supervision of the Constitution from the perspective of system design.

;

;“Strengthening the implementation and supervision of the Constitution is an important way to implement the principles of legislation in accordance with the Constitution and the law. It maintains the unity of the socialist legal system and the authority of the Constitution with the highest legal effect, and is conducive to improving the quality of legislation and Ensure good laws and good governance," said Mo Jihong, director of the Institute of Law of the Chinese Academy of Social Sciences.

;

;The life of the Constitution lies in its implementation, and the authority of the Constitution also lies in its implementation.

;

;Since the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, the Party Central Committee with Comrade Xi Jinping as the core has placed the comprehensive implementation of the Constitution in a prominent position in comprehensively governing the country according to law, promoted innovation in constitutional theory and constitutional practice, and deepened the understanding of our country’s constitutional system We have adopted a series of effective measures to strengthen the implementation and supervision of the Constitution and achieved important results and progress.

;

;Improve the legal systems and mechanisms related to the Constitution to better ensure the implementation of the Constitution -

;

;Amend the Organic Law of the National People's Congress, the Rules of Procedure of the National People's Congress, the Local Organic Law, and the Rules of Procedure of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress , the Organic Law of the People's Courts, the Organic Law of the People's Procuratorate, formulate the Supervision Law, the Law on the Protection of Heroes and Martyrs, the Patriotism Education Law, amend the National Flag Law and the National Emblem Law, and promote the implementation of relevant provisions of the National Anthem Law...implement the requirements of the Constitution and promote the implementation of the Constitution closely related The legal system has evolved with the times.

;

;Carry out work directly related to the implementation of the Constitution in accordance with the law, and vigorously promote the spirit of the Constitution——

;

;In 2019 and 2020, in accordance with the decisions and arrangements of the Party Central Committee and the implementation of the provisions of the Constitution, the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress We have made two decisions on awarding national medals and national honorary titles, giving full play to the spiritual guidance and exemplary role of the party and the country's honorary commendations, and promoting the formation of a good atmosphere in the whole society that respects the best, advocates heroes, and strives to be a pioneer.

;

;Promote good governance with good laws, and the socialist legal system with Chinese characteristics with the Constitution as the core continues to develop and improve -

;

;Formulate the Civil Code, Foreign Investment Law, National Security Law and other laws, and amend National Defense Law, Environmental Protection Law and other laws, strengthen legislation in key areas, emerging areas, and foreign-related areas... In recent years, we have insisted on legislating in accordance with the constitution, resolutely implemented the provisions of the Constitution, the principles of the Constitution, and the spirit of the Constitution into legislation, and reflected them in various laws in regulations. As of now, there are 299 effective laws and 602 administrative regulations in my country.

;

;The affairs of the world are not difficult to legislate, but difficult to implement.

;

;To improve the constitutional supervision system, we must actively and steadily advance the constitutionality review work, strengthen the filing review system and capacity building, revoke and correct unconstitutional and illegal normative documents in accordance with the law, and safeguard the authority of the Constitution.

;

;During the review of the draft Law on the Protection of Heroes and Martyrs, the scope of heroes and martyrs was clarified in accordance with the spirit of the preamble to the Constitution and the inscription on the Monument to the People’s Heroes;

;

;In the review of the draft law on the establishment of a financial court in Shanghai In the process of making a draft decision, we referred to the practice of establishing other specialized courts and put forward deliberation opinions that are consistent with the spirit of the Constitution;

;

;Research and analyze whether the legal amendment authority and procedures of the draft amendment to the Criminal Procedure Law are in compliance with the provisions of the Constitution, and put forward Deliberative opinions and handling methods that are in line with the spirit of the Constitution;

;

;…………

;

;Effectively ensure the constitutionality of every draft law and draft decision and resolution submitted for review Every law, every system, and every provision is in compliance with the provisions of the Constitution, the principles of the Constitution, and the spirit of the Constitution. Today, in the process of legislation, law amendment, law interpretation, and decision-making, the National People's Congress and its Standing Committee have taken a series of measures to carry out constitutionality review work and promote the explicitness, standardization, and normalization of constitutionality review work.

;

;What should I do if the local penalty standards are too low for private demolition of load-bearing walls? Do owners who do not actually move in after delivery need to pay property fees? Who owns the water supply and power supply facilities in the community? …Not long ago, the Legal Affairs Committee of the Standing Committee of the National People’s Congress announced a filing and review case to review and correct many issues such as the “penalty standards for private demolition of load-bearing walls” in local property management regulations.

;

;In recent years, the Legal Affairs Committee of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress has focused on employment, travel, medical and other areas of people's livelihood, continued to increase the intensity of filing and review, and reviewed and dealt with a number of people's complaints that concentrated on people's vital interests. , "issue" regulations and judicial interpretations that directly involve citizens' rights and obligations, safeguarding citizens' legitimate rights and interests and the unity of the country's rule of law.

;

;It is necessary for the National People's Congress and its Standing Committee to carry out record review of administrative regulations, local regulations, judicial interpretations and other normative documents. an important function. After continuous efforts and vigorous promotion, the record-filing review work has been steadily advanced, the review intensity has been continuously increased, the review methods have been continuously enriched, and the rigidity of error correction has been enhanced, effectively ensuring that the Constitution is accurately and comprehensively implemented.

;

;;The foundation of the Constitution lies in the heartfelt support of the people, and the power of the Constitution lies in the people’s sincere belief;

;

;“Propaganda and establishment of the authority of the Constitution must be regarded as We must pay close attention to major issues related to comprehensively promoting the rule of law.”

;

;The new situation and new tasks urgently require strengthening the publicity and education of the Constitution, promoting the normalization and long-term effectiveness of the publicity and education of the Constitution, making the spirit of the Constitution deeply rooted in the hearts of the people, and focusing on the spirit of the Constitution.

;

;Visit the Constitution Publicity and Education Exhibition, carry out Constitution-themed lectures, and hold a Constitution swearing-in ceremony... Nanjing Constitution Park in Jiangsu Province focuses on the glorious process of the Communist Party of China leading the people to formulate and implement the Constitution. Since its establishment and opening up, it has become a cadre It is a popular place for people to carry out constitutional propaganda and education and organize activities to honor the constitution.

;

;“We will implement the relevant provisions on constitutional publicity and education, carefully plan various constitutional publicity and education activities for different groups, and effectively build the Constitution Park into an important carrier of constitutional publicity and an important position for constitutional education. The Constitution is sworn in at a fixed place, making it a conscious action for people to abide by the Constitution and respect the Constitution." said the responsible comrade of the Standing Committee of the Nanjing Municipal People's Congress.

;

;Know the law in your heart and abide by the law in your deeds.

;

;Carrying out publicity and education on the Constitution is an important and basic work for the comprehensive implementation of the Constitution. Since the nationwide popularization of the law in 1986, every five-year legal popularization plan has regarded learning and publicizing the Constitution as an important task for the popularization of the law.

;

;Constitutional publicity and education should seize the "key minority" of leading cadres -

;

;Incorporate the Constitution into the learning content of the theoretical study center group of the Party Committee (Party Group) and list it as a Party School (Administrative School) , Cadre College, and Socialist College compulsory courses; take leading cadres to take the lead in learning the Constitution and model compliance with the Constitution as the top priority for the whole society to establish constitutional awareness, and strive to improve the central organization of the Party Committee (Party Group) to study law, rule of law training, and make decisions in accordance with the law In terms of systems and other aspects, promote the in-depth study, publicity and education of the Constitution among leading cadres; fully implement the Constitutional Oath-taking system, encourage state agencies to organize state workers to carry out Constitutional Oath-taking activities, and enhance the consciousness and determination to abide by the principles of the Constitution and fulfill the mission of the Constitution... Various places All departments have strengthened constitutional education for leading cadres and state workers, and effectively promoted the significant enhancement of state workers' constitutional awareness and concept of the rule of law.

;

;Young people are the future of the motherland and a new force in the construction of the socialist rule of law -

;

;Incorporate constitutional education into the national education system and universally set up constitutional knowledge courses in primary and secondary schools; continuously organize and carry out In the 8th national student “Learning and Talking about the Constitution” series of activities, more than 7.2 billion people have participated in online learning of the Constitution this year, and 157 million “defenders of the Constitution” have been created after completing study, practice, and comprehensive evaluation; On National Constitution Day, "Morning Reading of the Constitution" was organized in primary and secondary schools across the country. More than 80 million teachers and students from nearly 300,000 schools participated in the main venue through the Internet... Relevant departments carried out Constitution publicity and education activities that are suitable for the physical and mental characteristics of young students. , create a sense of ritual for learning and respecting the Constitution, and guide young people to establish legal awareness of the Constitution and develop the habit of respecting and abiding by the law from an early age.

;

;The foundation of the Constitution lies in the heartfelt support of the people, and the power of the Constitution lies in the sincere belief of the people.

;

;The "May 4th Constitution" historical materials exhibition hall located on the bank of the West Lake in Hangzhou, Zhejiang has attracted millions of visitors since its opening in 2016 to listen to the story of the Constitution and feel the spirit of the Constitution;

;

;When you walk into the Constitution Education Center in Nanchang, Jiangxi, you will see a huge, bright red constitution book. The local government carries out activities such as citizen legal education, pre-appointment constitutional knowledge examinations for state staff, and constitutional oaths;

;

;At the Constitution Publicity and Education Base in Taiyuan City, Shanxi Province, precious graphic and historical materials on the Constitution tell the story of the development of our country’s Constitution, attracting people to stop and watch;

;

;…………

;

;In recent years, various localities have strengthened the construction of constitutional publicity positions, established constitutional publicity and education venues, organized various forms of constitutional publicity and education activities, integrated constitutional publicity and education into people's daily work, study and life, and promoted the normalization and long-term effectiveness of constitutional publicity and education .

;

;Only when it is internalized in the heart can it be externalized in behavior.

;

;As the whole society widely carries out publicity and education on respecting the Constitution, learning the Constitution, abiding by the Constitution, safeguarding the Constitution, and applying the Constitution, the people's constitutional awareness continues to increase, and the spirit of the socialist rule of law is fully demonstrated.

;

;In order to carry out in-depth publicity and education on the Constitution, the General Office of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress has held National Constitution Day symposiums with relevant departments in recent years to popularize constitutional knowledge, enhance constitutional awareness, promote the spirit of the Constitution, and promote the implementation of the Constitution.

;

;The formulation, development, and implementation of our country’s Constitution have a series of wonderful and moving stories. In recent years, various localities and departments have told the story of China's Constitution to enable the whole society to fully understand the historic changes and great progress that the Constitution has brought to the country and people's lives, making the spirit of the Constitution alive and promoting the implementation of the Constitution to become the consciousness of all people. action.

;

;The stories of the Constitution are well-known to people, making the spirit of the Constitution deeply rooted in the hearts of the people, and forming a good atmosphere in the whole society of respecting the law, learning the law, abiding by the law, and using it.

;

;“To comprehensively govern the country according to law, we must always take the Constitution as the fundamental basis.” The relevant person in charge of the Constitution and Law Committee of the National People’s Congress said that on the new journey of promoting the rule of law in China, we must always adhere to the Constitution as the fundamental law of the country. status, adhere to the rule of law and governance in accordance with the constitution, firmly consolidate the foundation of the construction of socialist rule of law with Chinese characteristics, and provide constitutional guarantee for comprehensively promoting the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation.
